title: Spotify 's premium subscribers 2015 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Paying subscribers in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Paying subscribers in millions 124.0 is found at Quarter Q4 2019 and the minimum is found at Q1 2015 where Quarter is 18.0.
The difference of Paying subscribers in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 106.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Paying subscribers in millions for 20 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 2019 has the highest Paying subscribers in millions and Q1 2015 has the lowest Paying subscribers in millions.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Paying subscribers in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Paying subscribers in millions 124.0 is found at Quarter Q4 2019 and the minimum is found at Q1 2015 where Quarter is 18.0.
The difference of Paying subscribers in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 106.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Paying subscribers in millions in the y axis.
The Paying subscribers in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2015.
Quarter Q3 2019 has the second highest value for Paying subscribers in millions.
The lowest value at Quarter Q1 2015 is 6.89x times less than the highest value at Q4 2019.
Quarter Q4 2019 is higher than any other Quarters with value 124.0, followed by Q3 2019, and Q2 2019. Down to Quarter Q1 2015 with the lowest value 18.0.
The Paying subscribers in millions has reduced over the past 20 Quarters.
The highest value 124.0 at Q4 2019 is almost 1.94 times larger than the average value 63.8.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 1276.0.
